Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The energy levels of the copolymers are lower than those of other heteroarene - based DPP copolymers reported previously , [21][22][23][24][25][26] and their low - lying HOMO energy levels are expected to afford high V OC s of the polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

```diff
| Property Value |
| --- |
| lower |
| those of other heteroarene - based DPP copolymers reported previously |
| low - lying HOMO energy levels |
| high V OC s |
```
Explanation:

* "lower" is a property value compared to the energy levels of other heteroarene-based DPP copolymers.
* "those of other heteroarene - based DPP copolymers reported previously" is a property value representing the energy levels of other copolymers mentioned in references 21 to 26.
* "low - lying HOMO energy levels" is a property value indicating the position of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy levels.
* "high V OC s" is a property value representing the open-circuit voltage (Voc) of the polymer solar cells.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

```diff
| Property Value |
| --- |
| lower |
| low - lying HOMO energy levels |
| high V OC s |
```
Explanation:

* "lower" is a property value compared to the energy levels of other heteroarene-based DPP copolymers.
* "low - lying HOMO energy levels" is a property value indicating the position of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy levels.
* "high V OC s" is a property value representing the open-circuit voltage (Voc) of the polymer solar cells.

The other entity "those of other heteroarene - based DPP copolymers reported previously" was not included as it does not clearly refer to a value of a material property. It is a comparison to other copolymers, but it does not specify a particular value.
